plot: Home viewers cold win as much as $25 depending how long it took a panel of cartoonists and a guest competitor to figure what sent-in idea inspired a series of cartoons suggestive of it.
plot_en: Home viewers cold win as much as $25 depending how long it took a panel of cartoonists and a guest competitor to figure what sent-in idea inspired a series of cartoons suggestive of it.

title: Draw to Win
